title: Elementalist Lux on Nexus Siege
body: While I was playing Nexus Siege I noticed when you evolve her to a different version of herself in the 1st half of the featured game you will be unable to select that certain evolution of her in the second half. For example: If I choose the fire evolution, I will be unable to select that evolution when I go into the second half when I am back to the base Lux evolution at the start of the 2nd half and I will have to choose a different version like water, wind, etc. Curious if any other players have noticed or experienced this. Thanks and have a great day!

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and myself (skins) and another Rioter on RGM are looking into what's going on. :)
